lines.text: pure, unadulterated junk food. At this point who cares about chemicals?

[looking up at the vent]
Where's Connie and Ed?... Where's Connie and Ed?

[while giving a TV interview]
I could kill you right now, couldn't I?

[breaks a coffee pot over his guard's head]
Do you want cream or sugar with that?

[draws his gun on Ralph]
Drop those knives.
Knives? These are not knives, these are fine surgical instruments.

[trying to hit Dr. Berrisford with his car]
If you don't like the way I drive, Dr. Addictive Buttface, stay out of the parking lot!
